Interface BlackjackVariation

All Known Implementing Classes:
AarhusCasinoVariation
public interface BlackjackVariation

BlackjackVariation encapsulates the specialization of the rules used.

Author:
Jesper Kristensen

Method Summary
 int betStep()
          The step between allowed bets has to be a multiplum of 2.

Method Detail

numberOfDecks

int numberOfDecks()
Returns:
the number of decks used.

deckPenetration

int deckPenetration()
Returns:
the percentage of the cards used before reshuffling.

maxSplits

int maxSplits()
By splitting n times n+1 hands will be played.

Returns:
the number of splits that's allowed.

doubleAllowed

boolean doubleAllowed(int cardSum)
Parameters:
cardSum - the sum of the two received cards.
Returns:
true iff the player is allowed to double.

doubleAfterSplitAllowed

boolean doubleAfterSplitAllowed()
Returns:
true iff the player is allowed to double after having split.

dealerStandsOnSoft17

boolean dealerStandsOnSoft17()
Returns:
true iff the dealer have to stand on soft 17.

minBet

int minBet()
The minimum allowed bet has to be a multiplum of 2.

Returns:
the minimum allowed bet.

maxBet

int maxBet()
The maximum allowed bet has to be a multiplum of 2.

Returns:
the maximum allowed bet.

betStep

int betStep()
The step between allowed bets has to be a multiplum of 2. Typically it is identical to minBet.

Returns:
the step between allowed bet.
